sources.title: Nick's Coffee Pot (1939)
sources.description: The citizens of Bugville attend the grand opening of a new night spot, Nick's Coffee Pot. The villain (a spider) kidnaps the waitress heroine (a bug) and the kitchen boy hero (another bug) rushes to her rescue. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/nicks-coffee-pot-1939/

metadata.Plot: The citizens of Bugville attend the grand opening of a new night spot, Nick's Coffee Pot. The villain (a spider) kidnaps the waitress heroine (a bug) and the kitchen boy hero (another bug) rushes to her rescue.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
